name: Burk Knowlton
goals: Signed up for SBT GRVL 73 miler. Competitive — wants to finish strong for age group. Wants a structured plan to follow consistently.
strengths: Cardio and endurance athlete by nature. Very good at sticking to a plan when he has one. Played sports every season in high school. Sprint triathlon in college. Regular runner.
weaknesses: Gets inconsistent without a training plan. Doesn't recover as well as before — sometimes overtrains or doesn't recover well due to improper fueling, not enough stretching/mobility, or not resting enough. Muscles are always tight.
strength_routine: Dumbbells and kettlebells — chest day, back day, arms day, leg day. Peloton 30-min rides. Running when weather permits.
injuries: Acid reflux and associated GI issue — managed with strict diet (no caffeine). Much improved but still recovering. On Pepcid.
devices: Heart rate monitor, GPS device, smartphone app
experience_detail: Played sports every season in high school. Sprint triathlon in college. Always been a runner. Primarily lifts weights, HIIT, or indoor cycle on Peloton now. Trained for and completed a half marathon last summer. Just got a gravel bike and starting to ride. Currently targets 5-6 workouts/week, 30min-1hr each with one longer weekend workout. Some weeks only 3 days. Training with friends Benjy Duke and Kyle Cocowitch for SBT GRVL.
schedule_notes: Works overtime 40-60 hours/week. Travels 1-2 nights per week — typically leaves Monday afternoon, returns Wednesday afternoon. Needs to mix in strength training on travel days when without the bike. Training window 5:30 AM - 9:30 PM.
